text:
A search of https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-policies

shows SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge for all policy-based keys. 
If you are looking at controlling ‘First Run’ experience with related settings
there is handy info here -
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-policies#hidefirstrunexperience
 
D.

metadata.topic: RE: Is the registry key for controlling Edge MicrosoftEdge or just plain Edge?
metadata.subject: [patchmanagement] RE: Is the registry key for controlling Edge MicrosoftEdge or just plain Edge?
metadata.email_text_original:
A search of https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-policies
[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Flearn.microsoft.com%2Fen-us%2Fdeployedge%2Fmicrosoft-edge-policies&data=05%7C02%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C7ac1fa5915a84fb79bd508dc26b442bc%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638427802859446189%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=M0OiHtOaKluFivNCv5rg%2F7yoHxHVbXohY9%2FxX1VnHIY%3D&reserved=0]
shows SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Edge for all policy-based keys. 
If you are looking at controlling ‘First Run’ experience with related settings
there is handy info here -
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/deployedge/microsoft-edge-policies#hidefirstrunexperience
[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Flearn.microsoft.com%2Fen-us%2Fdeployedge%2Fmicrosoft-edge-policies%23hidefirstrunexperience&data=05%7C02%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C7ac1fa5915a84fb79bd508dc26b442bc%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638427802859454944%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=kI5ITw5JeVVrVQVXDGkYN96mEalSijd7xBophvlhCtI%3D&reserved=0] 
D. 
From: 'Susan Bradley' via PatchManagement <patchmanagement@googlegroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, February 6, 2024 11:46 AM
To: patchmanagement@googlegroups.com
Subject: [patchmanagement] Is the registry key for controlling Edge
MicrosoftEdge or just plain Edge? 
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/answers/questions/794151/how-to-block-welcome-to-microsoft-edge-first-run-q
[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Flearn.microsoft.com%2Fen-us%2Fanswers%2Fquestions%2F794151%2Fhow-to-block-welcome-to-microsoft-edge-first-run-q&data=05%7C02%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C7ac1fa5915a84fb79bd508dc26b442bc%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638427802859461955%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=VM1uczpI%2FsS4gZHK7UGBC9ALFi58MhfvpvgZyDGe2Lg%3D&reserved=0] 
if you do that in group policy the registry key it builds id under MicrosoftEdge
not Edge - so which is it? 
--
Link: https://groups.google.com/d/msgid/patchmanagement/aab2d3e408cd4cddb5c63d083546ffb5%40ausmarinetech.com.au
